document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the type specimens deposited in the Department of Entomology, National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic *

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the type specimens deposited in the Department of Entomology, National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic *

subSubSection.paragraph:
Euchorthippus declivus štíchai MaĜan, 1954a: 137
.
The holotype , allotype and 46 paratypes (all with extended right wings) are deposited in
NMPC:

HOLOTYPE (J, both posterior legs missing): ‘ Slovakia mer. / Kamenín [p] 3.8.52 [hw] / Exc. M. N. Pragae [p] //
Holotypus [p, red label] // Mus. Nat. Pragae / Inv. [p] 2586 [hw, orange label] // Euchorthippus / declivus štíchai / n. ssp. m. / III. [hw] 19[p]54. J Holotyp. [hw] / Dr. J. MaĜan det. [p] // HOLOTYPE / EUCHORTHIPPUS / declivus / stichai MaĜan, 1954 / label attached by NMP [p, red label]’.

ALLOTYPE ( ♀ , left posterior leg missing):‘ Slovakia mer./ Kamenín [p] 3.8.52 [hw] / Exc.M.N. Pragae [p] //
Allotypus [p, red label] // Mus. Nat. Pragae / Inv. [p] 2587 [hw, orange label] // Euchorthippus / declivus štíchai / n. ssp. m. / III. [hw] 19[p]54. ♀ Allotypus [hw] / Dr. J. MaĜan det. [p] //
ALLOTYPE / EUCHORTHIPPUS / declivus / stichai MaĜan, 1954 / label attached by NMP [p, red label]
’.

PARATYPES (2 JJ): ‘ Slovakia mer. / Kamenín [p] 2.8.52 [hw] / Exc. M. N. Pragae [p] // Paratypus [p, red label] // Mus. Nat. Pragae / Inv. [p] 2588, 2589 [respectively; hw, orange label] // Euchorthippus / declivus štíchai / n. ssp. m. / III. [hw] 19[p]54.J paratyp. [hw] / Dr. J. MaĜan det. [p] // PARATYPE / EUCHORTHIPPUS / declivus / stichai MaĜan, 1954 / label attached by NMP [p, red label]’.

PARATYPE (J): ‘ Slovakia mer. / Kamenín [p] 3.8.52 [hw] / Exc. M. N. Pragae [p] // Paratypus [p, pink label] // Mus. Nat. Pragae / Inv. [p] 2590 [hw, orange label] // Euchorthippus / declivus štíchai / n. ssp. m. / III. [hw] 19[p]54. J paratyp. [hw] / Dr. J. MaĜan det. [p] // PARATYPE / EUCHORTHIPPUS / declivus / stichai MaĜan, 1954 / label attached by NMP [p, red label]’.

PARATYPE (J): ‘ Slovakia mer. / Kamenín [p] 3.8.52 [hw] / Exc. M. N. Pragae [p] // Paratypus [p, ochre label] // Mus. Nat. Pragae / Inv. [p] 2591 [hw, orange label] // Euchorthippus / declivus štíchai / MaĜan / III. [hw] 19[p]54. paratypus J [hw] / Dr. J. MaĜan det. [p] // PARATYPE / EUCHORTHIPPUS / declivus / stichai MaĜan, 1954 / label attached by NMP [p, red label]’.

PARATYPE (J): ‘ Slovakia mer. / Kamenín [p] 2.8.52 [hw] / Exc. M. N. Pragae [p] // Paratypus [p, ochre label] // Mus. Nat. Pragae / Inv. [p] 2592 [hw, orange label] // Euchorthippus / declivus štíchai / MaĜan / III. [hw] 19[p]54. J [hw] / Dr. J. MaĜan det. [p] // PARATYPE / EUCHORTHIPPUS / declivus / stichai MaĜan, 1954 / label attached by NMP [p, red label]’.

Current status. Junior synonym of
Euchorthippus declivus (Brisout de Barneville, 1848)
.
